name: Nothingrania
additional_info:
It's just nothing. Nothing more. Nothing less.

Final Update Again

Updates
-The quest completion/no quest message will appear when necessary.
-The death message will appear when players die.
-Removed the level up message.
-Removed unnecessary text in the Autoing message. Now only shows the number of autos.
-Centered everything.
-Resized #main div to 100% of viewport.

Bug Fix
-Users could not see the number of autos when they did not receive a statue drop.
